#summary Changing the style of the pieces

To change the style of the pieces, add this to the end of the URL:

{{{
&piece_style=style
}}}

The default style is `merida`. These are the available styles:

|| `adventurer` || http://www.eddins.net/steve/chess/ChessImager/ChessImager.php?fen=rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR/&piece_style=adventurer&square_size=25&nonsense=foobar.png || `alfonso` || http://www.eddins.net/steve/chess/ChessImager/ChessImager.php?fen=rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR/&piece_style=alfonso&square_size=25&nonsense=foobar.png ||
